https://tmrev.io/movie/557800-At the Heart of Gold: Inside the USA Gymnastics Scandal 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/a3t1RktaXBTfNmwzuIoTC4rpuJj.jpg A look inside the USA gymnastics sexual abuse scandal that shook the sports world in 2017 depicting a landscape in which women spend their youth seeking victory on a world stage, juxtaposed against a culture where abuse prevails and lives are damaged forever. At the Heart of Gold: Inside the USA Gymnastics Scandal
